## Overview

ctar offers standardized versions of cross-trait association methods.

## Installation

::: pkgdown-devel
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install development version from GitHub
pak::pak("slamballais/ctar")
```
:::

## Usage

```{r}
library(ctar)

p <- replicate(2, runif(100000), simplify = FALSE)
out <- sumrank(p)
```
